constantValues: The insurer may provide both the details for the requested coverage as well as details for additional coverages known to the insurer.

members.name: benefitBalance

constantValues: Benefits and optionally current balances by Category.

members.description: Benefits and optionally current balances by Category.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: benefitBalanceCategoryId

constantValues: Dental, Vision, Medical, Pharmacy, Rehab etc.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Dental, Vision, Medical, Pharmacy, Rehab etc.

members.name: benefitBalanceDescription

constantValues: A richer description of the benefit, for example 'DENT2 covers 100% of basic, 50% of major but exclused Ortho, Implants and Costmetic services'.

members.description: A richer description of the benefit, for example 'DENT2 covers 100% of basic, 50% of major but exclused Ortho, Implants and Costmetic services'.

members.name: benefitBalanceExcluded

constantValues: True if the indicated class of service is excluded from the plan, missing or False indicated the service is included in the coverage.

members.description: True if the indicated class of service is excluded from the plan, missing or False indicated the service is included in the coverage.

members.name: benefitBalanceName

constantValues: A short name or tag for the benefit, for example MED01, or DENT2.

members.description: A short name or tag for the benefit, for example MED01, or DENT2.
